properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_GENDER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') ENROLL_DATE FROM "MEMBER" WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ? AND SECESSION_FL ='N'
SELECT MANAGER_NO, MANAGER_ID, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_GENDER, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') ENROLL_DATE FROM "MANAGER" WHERE MANAGER_ID = ? AND MANAGER_PW = ?
